snippet: Randy Blythe was freed after spending a month in jail in connection with the death of a fan at a 2010 concert in Prague.
abstract: Randy Blythe was freed after spending a month in jail in connection with the death of a fan at a 2010 concert in Prague.

headline.main: Heavy-Metal Singer Is Released From a Czech Jail
headline.print_headline: Lamb of God Singer Released on Bail
